hero.title: Luxury Mediterranean Yacht Hire
hero.subtitle: Hourly Private Cruises
hero.description: Reimagine your summer with our bespoke European fleet.

itineraries.title: Itineraries
itineraries.subtitle: Destinations
itineraries.description: Discover our curated region-based sailings across the most iconic coastlines of Europe.

regions.name: Barcelona
regions.description: Experience the vibrant culture and stunning architecture of Barcelona from the sea. Sail past the iconic W Hotel, the beaches of Barceloneta, and venture North towards the rugged beauty of Costa Brava.

regions.name: Monaco
regions.description: Immerse yourself in the glitz and glamour of the French Riviera. Cruise along the coast to Nice and Cannes, anchoring in crystal clear bays and enjoying world-class dining and nightlife.

regions.name: Santorini
regions.description: Sail into the caldera of Santorini, a sight like no other. Explore the volcanic islands, swim in the hot springs, and witness the world-famous sunset from the deck of your private yacht.

regions.name: Mykonos
regions.description: Discover the cosmopolitan vibe of Mykonos. By day, relax on the pristine beaches of Psarou and Super Paradise. By night, experience the legendary nightlife or enjoy a quiet dinner in Little Venice.

regions.name: Dubrovnik
regions.description: Explore the 'Pearl of the Adriatic'. Cruise along the ancient city walls, visit the nearby Elafiti Islands, and discover hidden coves and untouched nature along the Dalmatian coast.

regions.name: Amalfi Coast
regions.description: Sail the dramatic coastline of Amalfi. Visit the picturesque towns of Positano and Amalfi, cruise to the island of Capri, and swim in the Blue Grotto. A journey of breathtaking beauty and Italian charm.

fleet.title: Our Fleet
fleet.subtitle: Luxury Collection
fleet.description: Choose from our exclusive selection of yachts available for hourly private hire.

items.name: The Royal Sovereign
items.description: The Royal Sovereign represents the pinnacle of maritime engineering and luxury. Designed for transoceanic range and comfort, it features a jacuzzi, beach club, and sky lounge.

items.name: Azure Horizon
items.description: Azure Horizon is perfect for exploring the hidden gems of the Mediterranean. With its sleek design and high speed, it offers both performance and comfort.

items.name: Mediterranean Pearl
items.description: A sporty and elegant yacht ideal for day trips or weekend getaways. The Mediterranean Pearl offers ample deck space for sunbathing and al fresco dining.

items.name: Monaco Star
items.description: Experience the lifestyle of the rich and famous aboard the Monaco Star. Featuring a modern interior, spacious salon, and extensive water sports equipment.

items.name: Riviera Lux
items.description: Compact yet luxurious, the Riviera Lux is the ultimate day cruiser. Fast, stylish, and comfortable, it's perfect for coastal hopping in style.

items.name: Aegean Queen
items.description: The Queen of the Aegean. This mega yacht offers unrivaled space and amenities for large groups. A floating palace for your ultimate vacation.

footer.title: EUROPEAN YACHTS
footer.description: Elevating the art of yacht chartering across the Mediterraneanâ€™s most coveted destinations. Experience luxury redefined.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Born from a passion for the sea and a dedication to unparalleled luxury.

experience.title: Redefining Maritime Luxury
experience.subtitle: The Experience
experience.description1: European Yachts was founded with a singular vision: to provide an escape that transcends the ordinary. We believe that a journey at sea should be more than just travel; it should be a symphony of comfort, elegance, and discovery.
experience.description2: From the azure waters of the Amalfi Coast to the vibrant shores of Ibiza, our meticulously curated fleet and bespoke itineraries ensure that every moment aboard is crafted to perfection.

items.title: Excellence
items.desc: We pursue perfection in every detail, from the condition of our vessels to the quality of our service.

items.title: Privacy
items.desc: Your sanctuary at sea. We guarantee the utmost discretion and exclusivity for you and your guests.

items.title: Personalization
items.desc: No two voyages are alike. We tailor every itinerary to your specific desires and dreams.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Bespoke experiences tailored to your desires.

items.title: Private Charters
items.desc: Experience the ultimate freedom. Charter a private yacht for a day, a week, or longer, and explore the coast at your own pace.

items.title: Corporate Events
items.desc: Impress clients and partners with a unique venue. Perfect for meetings, product launches, or team-building retreats.

items.title: Sunset Cruises
items.desc: Witness the Mediterranean sunset from the best seat in the house. Champagne, canapÃ©s, and breathtaking views.

items.title: Wellness Retreats
items.desc: Rejuvenate your mind and body. Onboard yoga sessions, spa treatments, and healthy gourmet cuisine.

items.name: James & Sarah L.
items.text: Simply the most unforgettable week of our lives. The crew on the Royal Sovereign anticipated our every need. The Amalfi Coast at sunset from the deck is a memory we will cherish forever.

items.name: Elena K.
items.text: Impeccable service and absolute privacy. European Yachts understands true luxury. The itinerary was perfectly paced, allowing us to discover hidden gems in Greece we never knew existed.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: A corporate retreat that set a new standard. The yacht was pristine, the internet fast, and the catering world-class. My team is still talking about it.
